edict: Convey yourself with regal dignity, claim what you desire and deserve, seek vengeance on those who wrong you
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Restricted">[Baalzebul (Lord of Flies)](/Deities.aspx?ID=394)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 300

Baalzebul was one of the first angels of [Heaven](/Planes.aspx?ID=41), a glorious lieutenant who followed [Asmodeus](/Deities.aspx?ID=278) in his exodus to [Hell](/Planes.aspx?ID=42). In this new realm, he led the infernal armies and trained several other archdevils as generals. When Asmodeus divided the nine realms of Hell between himself and the eight archdevils, Baalzebul protested, thinking he had earned a place at his god’s side. Asmodeus responded by stripping away the archdevil’s radiant form, reducing him to a figure composed of swarming flies. Now known as the Lord of Flies, he rules over Cocytus, the frozen seventh layer of Hell, and attracts followers possessed of deep ambition and a powerful drive to triumph.

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Archdevils](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=4)

**Edicts** Convey yourself with regal dignity, claim what you desire and deserve, seek vengeance on those who wrong you

**Anathema** Provoke Baalzebul’s envy, show humility

**Area of Concern**
Arrogance, flies, lies

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Dexterity or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Divine Sanctification** must choose unholy

**Divine Skill** [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=38)

**Favored Weapon** [Spear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=365)

**Domains** [Air](/Domains.aspx?ID=65), [Ambition](/Domains.aspx?ID=64), [Magic](/Domains.aspx?ID=82), [Trickery](/Domains.aspx?ID=94)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Secrecy](/Domains.aspx?ID=91), [Swarm](/Domains.aspx?ID=120), [Toil](/Domains.aspx?ID=122)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Fleet Step](/Spells.aspx?ID=1531)

- **2nd**
[Vomit Swarm](/Spells.aspx?ID=2041)

- **6th**
[Mislead](/Spells.aspx?ID=1605)

</column>
name: Baalzebul (Lord of Flies)
